attributes.action: Government create new legislation for Priority Council/Social Housing & Mortgage Scheme for British Forces Veteran’s + families too.
attributes.additional_details:
We are asking the Government to create new legislation for Priority Council/Social Housing & Mortgage Scheme for British Forces Veteran’s + families too, that is in return for minimum of 5 years in the British Forces, for the British Crown, Parliament & People.

Along with including Gurkha & Commonwealth service personnel, as well as for military families, especially families of service personnel Killed- or Wounded-in-the-Line-of-Duty.

With the Government, setting up this special Central Armed Forces Veteran’s Housing Fund with the Bank of England. Which local council’s & housing association’s can access, to provide rented housing for Priority Council/Social Housing for British Forces Veteran’s + families too. Equally this special Central Armed Forces Veteran’s Housing Fund, is also accessible to banks, to provide special rate/protected mortgages (unwritten by HMG) for British Forces Veteran’s + families too.
